description:
Lies happen. More often than not, they leave evidence behind. In this course, professional mentalist, Tim David shares how to effectively read people in order to determine whether or not deception is present in their words or actions.

Students should take this course if they regularly interact with people at work or at home. Knowing how to detect deception builds honesty and trust and creates deeper, more connected human relationships.
title: How to Detect Deception: Secrets of Human Lie Detectors
